Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Actors: Tom Kane, Matt Lanter, Dee Bradley Baker, James Arnold Taylor
Plot: Yoda, Mace Windu, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and other Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.
